Articles.Content:
I found this site, I remember it's where I got all my addons (mods) back in 0.9. One thing I remember was when the Sunday Punch mod was still on there I clicked the link and when I was about to download it, it said it was a virus. When I finally got the guts to download it, I think it was 0.11, the mod was discontinued, incompatible with KSP, and I remember installing it, seeing KSP not loading, so I went away and watched a TV show, and when I came back it said it was still loading, and I was like "WHAT THE HELL?!". Anyways, here's the link: http://www.kerbalspaceprogram.net/kerbal-space-program-mods

Ha, the old C7 pack is still there.

For anyone that remembers this, what was your favorite addon on there?
still cant beat the BFE-5000 Liquid Engine Mod for its sheer lolz

still cant beat the BFE-5000 Liquid Engine Mod for its sheer lolz

^^This. I hope it gets resurrected.
Wow, that page still exists? I remember those futuristic fuel nacelles were popular cheat parts back in the early days. Ah memories...

.

Edited July 16, 2019 by jie321
The heat management stuff still works (sort of). I still use the radial radiators to deal with pesky overheating first stages
KSPX parts pack. Best mod I have. Favorite part from it is the 2.5 to 1.25 4x adapter. It's the ultimate cluster staging tool!
I'm gonna save that link for later and see if I can't attach the BFE-5000 to one of my rockets. I've always wanted to try that engine, but never found a good download link..
It seems like the BFE is totally dead. I .cfg edited it to basically be a 5000kn skipper engine, but it produces no thrust.
my favorite was c7. i was a flying nut and always will be.

The heat management stuff still works (sort of). I still use the radial radiators to deal with pesky overheating first stages

It does? Will have to download. Heh. Funny. One of the first mods ever still works after a bunch of updates that should have broken it a long time ago. I know nothing about coding, but someone should try to update some of these mods.

EDIT: Oh wow: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/625-General-Solutions-Union-1-3

ANOTHER EDIT: I never even knew there was a Sunday Punch thread...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/59-Wobbly-rockets-Now-1-09-2-metre-parts-verniers-payload-fairings-MUCH-more

TRIPLE EDIT: Does anyone know if the old probe pack still works?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/12237-Silisko-Industries-Addon-Development-Thread-2

Edited July 18, 2013 by Tommy99534

It seems like the BFE is totally dead. I .cfg edited it to basically be a 5000kn skipper engine, but it produces no thrust.

I remember reading about a change in the way engines were specified in the part.cfg files

It probably just needs a bit of tweaking to the new engine/thrust transform model
Oh god. All of my nostalgia.

That's where I've got another copy of BFE-5000, hoping to update it for 0.20 and used for good once more. Also SIDR, Captain Slug, and Sunday Punch part packs - seen in their individual habitats

-snip-

Oh god. All of my nostalgia.

Oh how I missed this

-snip-

Mission to the Mun strapped to a piece of plywood? Seems totally logical in KSP.
The solid landing legs helped me make my first Mun landing.
Ah, so nostalgic. Yes that page was where I first discovered mods. I really loved the little RocketBird Pod, but man it must have been cramped in there!
BFE-5000. That engine got stuff done.

I once tried to update the Vanguard shuttle,Nutt07 taked over that project. Never heard of Vanguard since then. I have GIANT UNCONTROLABLE URGE to ask him for progress. If you are reading this Nutt,could you please reply?
It would be awesome if we'll get a plywood flyer updated for 0.20 - hard to describe what it would look like (and how it'll work) but for sure it'll be awesome

It would be awesome if we'll get a plywood flyer updated for 0.20 - hard to describe what it would look like (and how it'll work) but for sure it'll be awesome

As this stuff was before my time it would be cool. Perhaps someone could get the kerbals to attach the same way as they do on the seats, but lying down, as those od models look a little weird
Why do I feel like the BFE in the BFE engine meant "Big Fu***** Engine"?

Why do I feel like the BFE in the BFE engine meant "Big Fu***** Engine"?

you aren't alone.
I sort am sad to see the thunderbird three pack go. It was always my favourite Gerry Anderson craft, after fireball xl5

Why do I feel like the BFE in the BFE engine meant "Big Fu***** Engine"?

Big Freaking Engine.
